title: The dimension of the hollow tree of Hampsted.
author: Codrington, Robert, 1601-1665.
publisher: Printed by E. Cotes for M.S. at the Blue Bible in Green Arbour, and are to be given or sold on the Hollow Tree at Hampsted,
notes: Verse, by various hands - "Civill people, you welcome be,".
